name: Global Relay
description:
Global Relay is a leading provider of end-to-end compliance solutions for the global financial sector and other highly regulated industries.

Founded in 1999, Global Relay delivers services to over 20,000 customers in 90 countries, including 22 of the top 25 banks. Global Relay’s integrated compliance solutions enable regulated organizations to meet collaboration, privacy, and security requirements.

Our products include:

Global Relay App – enables entire organizations to communicate compliantly, both internally and across your client network, via WhatsApp, text, voice, and more.

Global Relay Connectors – help collect, store, access, and use your data to drive better outcomes.

Global Relay Archive – enriches, analyzes, and organizes unstructured communications data in one scalable, cloud data store.

Global Relay Surveillance – incorporating AI-assisted data classification, full escalation workflows, and audit reports.
